Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1965, off Bob Friend (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1965, off Bob Buhl (MIL)...
Injured on 4/9/1966 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1967, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1969...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1969...

Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 5/8/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1971, hitting .414 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1971, hitting .364 with 7 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1971...
Injured on 10/3/1972 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1973, hitting .395 with 7 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1973...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1975, hitting .382 with 5 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1975, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 10/3/1975 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1975...
Injured on 4/20/1976 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1976, hitting .481 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Released by New York (N) on 8/8/1977...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 8/8/1977 to a 1-year deal worth $364,000 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/4/1978, off Don Loun (TEX)...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 9/1/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/15/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $6,590,000 per year...
Injured on 4/13/1980 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
